books.author: by Andy Weir
books.description: Abandoned by his crew, an astronaut embarks on a dogged quest to stay alive.
books.name: THE MARTIAN

books.author: by Lee Child
books.description: Jack Reacher pries open a missing-persons case that takes him across the country and into the shadowy reaches of the Internet.
books.name: MAKE ME

books.author: by David Lagercrantz
books.description: Mikael Blomkvist and Lisbeth Salander are back in this continuation of Steig Larsson's Millennium series.
books.name: THE GIRL IN THE SPIDER'S WEB

books.author: by Jan Karon
books.description: Dooley, the adopted son of the Mitford character Father Tim Kavanagh, marries his childhood sweetheart.
books.name: COME RAIN OR COME SHINE

books.author: by Paula Hawkins
books.description: A psychological thriller set in the environs of London is full of complications and betrayals.
books.name: THE GIRL ON THE TRAIN

books.author: by Anthony Doerr
books.description: The lives of a blind French girl and a gadget-obsessed German boy before and during World War II; the winner of the 2015 Pulitzer Prize.
books.name: ALL THE LIGHT WE CANNOT SEE

books.author: by John Grisham
books.description: A downsized Wall Street lawyer joins a legal clinic in a small Virginia town, and litigates against the coal-mining industry.
books.name: GRAY MOUNTAIN

books.author: by Kristin Hannah
books.description: When a doctor's wife wakes from her coma, she thinks she's still married to her movie-star first husband.
books.name: ANGEL FALLS

books.author: by J. D. Robb
books.description: Lt. Eve Dallas races the clock to save a woman kidnapped by a couple on a murder spree; by Nora Roberts, writing pseudonymously.
books.name: DEVOTED IN DEATH

books.author: by Harper Lee
books.description: In the mid-1950s, a grown-up Jean Louise Finch returns to Maycomb and realizes that her adored father is a racist.
books.name: GO SET A WATCHMAN

books.author: by Debbie Macomber
books.description: A literature professor and a waitress forge a bond over their love of the classics.
books.name: THE WAY TO A MAN'S HEART

books.author: by Sue Grafton
books.description: A variety of X’s lead Kinsey Millhone into deep secrets and a cold case.
books.name: X

books.author: by Kristin Hannah
books.description: Two sisters are separated in World War II France: one in the countryside, the other in Paris.
books.name: THE NIGHTINGALE

books.author: by Richard Castle
books.description: When a detective and her journalist boyfriend team up to investigate an immigrant's death, fissures form in their relationship.
books.name: RAGING HEAT

books.author: by E. L. James
books.description: A "Fifty Shades of Grey" sequel, told from Christian’s point of view, revisits the tortured romance between the controlling billionaire and the unassuming Ana.
books.name: GREY
